description: Schema defining the status of a Submission. Should only be modified by evaluation admins.
name: SubmissionStatus

id.description: The unique, immutable Synapse ID of the Submission.

etag.description: Synapse employs an Optimistic Concurrency Control (OCC) scheme to handle concurrent updates. Since the E-Tag changes every time an entity is updated it is used to detect when a client's current representation of an entity is out-of-date.

modifiedOn.description: The date on which the status was last modified.

status.description: The current status of this Submission.
status.name: Status

report.description: A textual report describing this Submission. May contain additional scoring information, error logs, etc.

entityId.description: The Synapse ID of the Entity in this Submission.

versionNumber.description: The version number of the Entity.
